title: FS: Chase and McGraw Sovereign 460s- Off to eBay!

posts.post_title: FS: Chase and McGraw Sovereign 460s- Off to eBay!
posts.post_content:
For sale, Chase and McGraw, both PSA graded, and both with Sov 460 backs.  Paypal gift.  Prices reduced!

Chase, Hal - (Holding trophy)  PSA 4   [STRIKE]$225[/STRIKE]  $200
McGraw, John - (Glove at Hip) PSA 3   [STRIKE]$150[/STRIKE]  $140
Nice cards Luke, fair prices too....
Thanks, Kevin.  They are off to eBay!
